name: Berlin Marriott Hotel
description: Indulge yourself with a lavish stay in Germany at the Berlin Marriott Hotel. Our stylishly designed family hotel offers a modern interpretation of the Bauhaus style right in the heart of Berlin. Experience residential-like, comfortable guest rooms with novel platform beds as well as innovative technology and amenities like energy-saving and particularly hygienic circulating air cooling units. As a "LiYu" certified hotel, we also provide a variety of amenities and services tailored for our Chinese guests to experience throughout their stay. Fuel up with delectable food and the finest of steaks at the Midtown Grill or enjoy delicious hot dogs and a variety of craft beers from The Big Dog. Explore downtown Berlin from our well-situated business hotel near Potsdamer Platz, Brandenburg Gate and Tiergarten park. Our exceptional customizable event spaces and conference rooms are a perfect fit for your meeting or wedding needs. Let us make your stay at our pet-friendly hotel in Berlin unforgettable!

name: Hampton by Hilton Berlin City Centre Alexanderplatz
description: Daily Mandatory Charge includes: City Tax 7.5% on net logis per room /night. Right in the heart of the city, surrounded by famous attractions, you’ll find the Hampton by Hilton Berlin City Centre Alexanderplatz hotel. With the nearest train station just a 5 minute walk from our hotel, it’s easy to see the sights. Spend a night on the town in the entertainment district. Experience panoramic views of the city at the TV Tower and discover Berlin’s vibrant nightlife in various bars and restaurants. Shuttle service is available by reservation. Each day of your stay in Alexanderplatz is off to a great start with our hot breakfast included in your stay, featuring all your favorites including eggs, beans, waffles, fruit and more. Stop by the 24/7 Hub when you have a late night craving. Unwind in a spacious room with a 40-inch HDTV, free WiFi and an inviting armchair with ottoman. Rest peacefully on a clean and comfy bed. Make tea and coffee right in your own room. Ask our friendly team about connecting rooms and accessible room options.

name: Victor's Residenz-Hotel Berlin Mitte
description: Direkt gegenüber vom Volkspark Friedrichshain befindet sich das mit vier Sternen ausgezeichnete Victor's Residenz-Hotel Berlin. Es präsentiert sich mit einer modernen Glasfassade sowie einem klassischen Interieur. Insgesamt verfügt das Haus über 133 Zimmer und Suiten. Diese sind mit Pay-TV, kostenlosem WLAN, einem Schreibtisch, einer Sitzecke und einer Telefon-Flatrate ausgestattet. Die Annehmlichkeiten im Victor's Residenz-Hotel Berlin-Mitte umfassen sechs Tagungs- beziehungsweise Veranstaltungsräume, gebührenpflichtige Stellplätze in der eigenen Tiefgarage, eine Terrasse sowie einen begrünten Innenhof. Gegen Aufpreis ist zudem die Mitnahme von Haustieren erlaubt. Geschmackvoll genießen nach Victor’s Art: In unserem Frühstücksrestaurant starten Sie mit einem reichhaltigen Buffet perfekt in einen erlebnisreichen Tag. Bei schönem Wetter können Sie nach Gusto auch in unserem mediterran angelegten Innenhof Platz nehmen. Am Abend empfangen wir Sie in unserer stilvollen Victor’s Bar - mit Drinks, Snacks und ausgewählten Sport-Highlights live bei Sky und DAZN. Die Bushaltestelle Bötzowstraße befindet sich nur eine Gehminute entfernt. Von hier aus beträgt die Fahrtzeit zum Alexanderplatz acht Minuten. Den Hackeschen Markt erreicht man mit dem Bus in einer Viertelstunde.

name: NH Berlin Alexanderplatz
description: Set in Berlin’s hip artistic district of Friedrichshain, NH Berlin Alexanderplatz is well-connected to all of the city’s top attractions. Across the street, guests will find the Volkspark Friedrichshain Park, while coffee shops and beer gardens are just down the street. Take a 10-minute tram ride to Alexanderplatz square from the Klinikum im Friedrichshain stop. The Strausberger Platz metro station is only a short walk away. If driving, the hotel has an underground parking garage. NH Berlin Alexanderplatz also has a lot of surprises for its guests, such as the 50,000 bees that the hotel keeps on the roof. There are 225 modern stylish rooms that are equipped with free Wi-Fi and were renovated in 2018. Some have a lovely view of the Frankfurter Tor Square or the TV tower. For lunch and dinner, head to the hotel’s restaurant, which features international cuisine. During good weather, enjoy your meal on the summer terrace. Otherwise, relax on a cozy sofa in front of the fireplace, with a great German beer and light bites at our bar. The hotel also has spa facilities, with a steam room, sauna,infrared sauna, wellness showers, fitness area and foot-bath. For meetings, there are 12 function rooms.

name: Waldorf Astoria Berlin
description: The Waldorf Astoria Berlin welcomes its guests in the heart of Berlin’s City West with contemporary luxury combined with unparalleled Waldorf Service. 232 generous rooms and suites provide quiet comfort in an eclectic mix of warm colors and modern Art Deco style. Guests experience an air of refined exclusivity at Germany’s first Waldorf Astoria Spa. ROCA offers an all-day, dining experience featuring seasonal Eastern Mediterranean cuisine while the Library Lounge on the 15th floor is exclusively reserved for hotel guests. Epic views and sophisticated ambiance are constant companions, while Berlin’s legendary shopping boulevard Kurfuerstendamm is just a stroll away.

name: Premier Inn Berlin Alexanderplatz
description: Our stylish Premier Inn Berlin Alexanderplatz hotel is ideal if you’re looking for great-value hotels in Berlin. Thanks to our handy location just a five-minute walk away from Alexanderplatz, you’ll have some of Berlin’s top attractions right on your doorstep when you stay with us. Families can enjoy days out with the kids in Berlin at spots like Little BIG City, while culture-lovers can see the famous Berliner Fernsehturm and World Time Clock – two of the most popular places to visit in Berlin – before exploring the scenic Gendarmenmarkt square. After exciting days out in Berlin, you can look forward to laid-back evenings at our bar and restaurant, before enjoying a great night’s sleep on one of our super-comfy beds.

name: Dorint Kurfurstendamm Berlin
description: Sofitel Berlin Kurfurstendamm Hotel is conveniently located in the popular Charlottenburg area. The property features a wide range of facilities to make your stay a pleasant experience. 24-hour front desk, facilities for disabled guests, luggage storage, Wi-Fi in public areas, valet parking are just some of the facilities on offer. Guestrooms are designed to provide an optimal level of comfort with welcoming decor and some offering convenient amenities like television LCD/plasma screen, internet access – wireless, air conditioning, heating, wake-up service. The hotel's peaceful atmosphere extends to its recreational facilities which include fitness center, sauna, massage. Sofitel Berlin Kurfurstendamm Hotel is an excellent choice from which to explore Berlin or to simply relax and rejuvenate.

Experience a fantastic evening effortlessly! Relish an entertaining night without venturing beyond the confines of the bar.

name: Best Western Hotel am Spittelmarkt
description: Located in Berlin,BE, the Best Western Hotel am Spittelmarkt is sure to provide a peaceful and comforting home away from home for any traveler. Each Best Western hotel provides free internet access, giving guests the opportunity to check emails and surf the web, all from the comforts of their room or the business center. With cleanliness and value being our top priority, we ensure a restful and productive stay. On top of that, our superior customer service will ensure that we meet all your needs and go beyond your expectations.

name: Motel One Berlin-Hauptbahnhof
description: Unser Motel One Berlin-Hauptbahnhof liegt nicht nur sehr verkehrsgünstig, auch das Design steht ganz im Zeichen des namensgebenden Bahnhofs: Von kunstvollen Gleisinstallationen über gemütliche Sitzecken, die an Zugabteile erinnern bis hin zu historischen Aufnahmen, welche die Entwicklung des Bahnhofs abbilden. Doch trotz der zentralen Lage, überrascht unser Motel One mit einer grünen Oase und natürlichen Holzterrasse zum Entspannen.

name: Crowne Plaza Berlin City Centre Kudamm By Ihg
description: A business hotel in Berlin city centre with a spa and conference facilities. Crowne Plaza® Berlin - City Ctr Nurnberger Ku'damm hotel is just off the famous Kurfürstendamm shopping street. Nearby U-Bahn station Zoologischer Garten or Wittenbergplatz provide access to Berlin Central Station or the iconic Brandenburg Gate in less than 15 minutes. Our 13 meeting rooms include private boardrooms and a conference centre for 1,000 guests. If you’re hosting an event, the Crowne Plaza Meetings Director can help arrange everything including catering. Delegates travelling by air can be at Berlin Airport (BER) in 40-60 minutes. Take a break at Berlin Zoo or the Haus der Kulturen der Welt arts centre in nearby Tiergarten park, also home to a lakeside beer garden. Ask the concierge for advice on local jogging routes. At this hotel you can enjoy: - Inclusive Wi-Fi as well as Indoor - outdoor parking for a daily fee Our Sleep Advantage® programme offers premium bedding and Quiet Zones for a good night’s sleep. Stay on your toes with a workout at the gym or a few laps in the indoor pool, book a treatment at the spa or wind down in the sauna. The Wilson’s Restaurant (closed until further notice) serves a classic American menu, with terrace dining in good weather. You can meet colleagues for a drink at Kemmons Bar.

name: Schulz Hotel Berlin Wall at the East Side Gallery
description: Newly opened in September 2018: Hotel Schulz Berlin Wall is located between East Side Gallery and Spree river in the popular area Friedrichshain and offers free highspeed Wi-Fi and a beer garden right next to an original piece of Berlin Wall. The hotel focuses on sustainability and social commitment. Nearby train station Ostbahnhof offers public transportation connections to all parts of Berlin Alexanderplatz is only 2 km away. Rooms are designed individually and are fitted with smart tv, adjustable room climate, USB-hubs and soundproof windows. All units are 100 porcent non-smoking and are equipped with desk and seating facility. Bathrooms are private and come with Queen size shower, care products and a hair dryer. Barrier free rooms are available. Pets are welcome at a fee. Guests at the accommodation will be able to use a fully equipped guest kitchen, a laundry room and library. Highspeed Wi-Fi is available for free throughout the whole property. Luggage deposit and lockers for valuables are available at a fee. The hotel offers free use of computers. A continental breakfast with international components can be enjoyed at the hotel restaurant. Vegan and gluten free options are available. The in-house café Martha offers Portugese specialities and fair-trade coffee, the hotel bar serves local brewed beer. The beer garden, open throughout spring, fall and summer, is located next to an original piece of the Berlin Wall. The property offers a 24-hour front desk and possibilities for pre-check-in and mobile check-in/check-out. Multilingual staff provide information on exploring the area. The Mercedes-Benz-Arena (0,8 km) and the popular districts Friedrichshain & Kreuzberg with their alternative art and culture-scene can be reached on foot. Berlin fair and central district Mitte with Alexanderplatz (2 km), Checkpoint Charlie (3 km) and Museum-Island (3 km) are easily to be reached by public transportation via train station Ostbahnhof. Berlin Tegel Airport is 11 k away, Berlin-Schönefeld airport is 15 km away.

name: Motel One Berlin-Alexanderplatz
description: Bunt und unkonventionell - das trifft nicht nur auf unser Motel One Berlin-Alexanderplatz, sondern auch auf den namensgebenden Platz zu. Denn dieser steht vor allem für kulturelle Vielfalt, Kontraste und Urbanität - und genau das, spiegelt sich auch in unserem Design wider: Von bunten Farbakzenten bis hin zu Street Art. Außerdem ist unser Motel One nicht nur der ideale Ausgangspunkt, um die Umgebung rund um das Hotel zu erkunden, sondern auch ideal gelegen, um die Großstadt zu erkunden.

name: H10 Berlin Ku'damm
description: The H10 Berlin Kudamm is located in one of the citys historic buildings, standing just feet away from the famous Kurfürstendamm avenue, the main shopping street in western Berlin, and very close to the Kaiser Wilhelm Memorial Church and the zoo. The hotel features the Salt & Pepper Restaurant, the Steps Bar, a Despacio Beauty Centre and seven meeting rooms.

name: The Mandala Hotel
description: Potsdamer Platz is Berlin’s epicenter of contemporary architecture, putting The Mandala Hotel in good company. The unassuming entrance, the hidden Qiu Bar & Restaurant on the first floor, the fifth-floor two-Michelin-star restaurant Facil, with its leafy courtyard views, and the wonderful top-floor Ono Spa all help to provide guests with discreet relief from the area’s hustle and bustle. Interiors pare luxury down to its modern essence of serenity and subtle harmonies but spare no expense with designer furnishings and artwork.

name: NH Collection Berlin Mitte am Checkpoint Charlie
description: NH Collection Berlin Mitte am Checkpoint Charlie, formerly known as NH Berlin Mitte Leipziger Strasse, is in the lively Mitte district, steps away from the Friedrichstrasse shopping street. Some of the city’s famous attractions, like Checkpoint Charlie and the Potsdamer Platz square are 10 minutes away on foot. Walk further and you will find yourself at the Gendarmenmarkt Square. For connections to the airport and other Berlin attractions, guests can catch the train at the nearby Stadtmitte U-Bahn metro station. NH Collection Berlin Mitte am Checkpoint Charlie features 392 rooms for every type of traveler, including connecting and family rooms. The décor is contemporary with a neutral palette highlighted by bright pops of color. For those who have trouble sleeping, there are ultra-quiet rooms. Every morning, guests may enjoy our delicious breakfast buffet. During lunch or dinner, NH Collection Berlin Mitte am Checkpoint Charlie Restaurant offers a comfortable atmosphere and a selection of international dishes. Or relax with a drink at the Grissini Bar, which features a Spanish Jamonería and an extensive wine list, all of which can be enjoyed on a terrace. There is also a wellness center with a gym and relaxation room.  For business travelers, 15 conference rooms are available and feature SMART Room Systems for videoconferencing.

name: Hampton by Hilton Berlin City West
description: Hampton by Hilton™ Berlin City West – in the centre of ‘City West’, in the middle of Berlin’s posh surroundings – therefore the best place to stay in Berlin. Hampton by Hilton™ is symbolic for accommodation with highest standards combined with moderate pricing and great value for your money. This brand has been developed for price-conscious traveling and has been classified with 3 Stars. Experience the market entry of the first Hampton by Hilton™ in Germany in Berlin’s most distinguished 'City West’ location – with close proximities to the renowned Kurfürstendamm (Ku’damm). You will find everything your heart desires: an abundance of possibilities to shop, numerous restaurants, and an excellent connection to Berlin’s public transport. Get inspired by the surroundings – stroll through the many chic boutiques on Ku’damm, treat yourself to some luxury at KaDeWe - the largest department store in Europe, pamper your senses in one of the numerous bars and restaurants around the Savignyplatz or discover the city on your own device by underground starting at Uhlandstrasse or Zoologischer Garten. Whether you are travelling on leisure or business, the new Hampton by Hilton™ is your start, your stepping stone, your trampoline into a new day, to the city, into the Berlin life. With its bold and yet discreet design, Hampton by Hilton™ creates an intriguing atmosphere, which invites the guest already upon arrival to relax and unwind in style. Trusted for a good night’s rest by value conscious and quality minded travelers. Therefore, Hampton by Hilton™ presents its rooms with noble and high quality interior with accents on a wide range of functions. All rooms are featured with a comfortable double-bed with several pillows, flat-screen TV, work-desk and further accessories like radio-alarm, electric kettle, iron, ironing-board and an individual adjustable air-conditioning. Large, fluffy towels and a 'rain-shower’ complement the fully equipped bathrooms. Additionally, our Hampton by Hilton™ Rooms Plus have been featured with a sofa, which can be converted to a double-bed. Our Hampton by Hilton™ Deluxe Rooms are located on our top floor and have a terrace with a great view over the city. Switch to comfy-mode in our HUB-Bar, which is open 24/7, and get indulged with some of our hot and cold snacks and drinks. Whether you would like to chill-out in our living-room-like ‘Living Zone’ or get prepared for the next meeting in our ‘Working Zone’, rest assured that we will look after you around the clock and you can feel like home away from home. Atmosphere pure. The Hampton by Hilton™ Berlin/City West is featured with modern gym facilities as well as 3 conference rooms for up to 100 guests. Hampton invites its guests to enjoy a free bountiful breakfast with hot and cold choices – even our breakfast sets new standards by sticking to high quality and usage of well-known products. Furthermore, we offer complimentary WLAN-access throughout the hotel. The Hampton by Hilton™ team offers you a feel-good-guarantee – open, friendly, personal, honest and with charming heartiness. Experience an unforgettable stay with us and feel the city’s pulse. Whether you are an early-bird-booker or a spontaneous city-cruiser, we have the best price for you. Regardless of whether you are booking in advance or if you would like to stay flexible with your stay, when booking via www.hilton.de we guarantee the best available rates. Booking in advance pays off, you will always find an excellent price and something to look forward to. Hampton by Hilton™ will fulfil your expectations and guarantees a 100%-satisfaction – our 100% satisfaction stands surety for this and if you are not happy with your stay, we do not expect you to pay. Our commitment is your guarantee - that is 100% Hampton by Hilton™. Hampton by Hilton™ Berlin City West - we love having you here™.

name: Park Inn by Radisson Berlin Alexanderplatz
description: Stay at Park Inn by Radisson Berlin Alexanderplatz Hotel adjacent to Galeria Kaufhof, Prenzlauer Berg, Hackesche Höfe and the Pergamon Museum

name: Hotel AMANO Grand Central
description: Located in Mitte, Hotel AMANO Grand Central is a perfect starting point from which to explore Berlin. The property offers guests a range of services and amenities designed to provide comfort and convenience. 24-hour front desk, facilities for disabled guests, luggage storage, Wi-Fi in public areas, restaurant are just some of the facilities on offer. Each guestroom is elegantly furnished and equipped with handy amenities. Take a break from a long day and make use of the fitness center, garden. Discover all Berlin has to offer by making Hotel AMANO Grand Central your base.

description: Experience an abundance of unparalleled facilities and features at Hotel Berlin Potsdamer Platz by Leonardo Hotels.Maintain seamless communication using the complimentary Wi-Fi at hotel. name: ibis budget Berlin City Potsdamer Platz
description: Das ibis budget Potsdamer Platz befindet sich in direkter Citylage nahe Potsdamer Platz und Brandenburger Tor. Die Anreise ist mit den öffentlichen Verkehrsmitteln oder über die 3 km entfernte A100 bequem möglich. Zum Hotel gehören 217 modern eingerichtete Zimmer. Unser WLAN-Zugang steht Ihnen kostenlos zur Verfügung und unsere Rezeption ist rund um die Uhr geöffnet. Ein Frühstücksbuffet am Morgen sowie ein Getränke- und Snackautomat helfen gegen Hunger und Durst. Kostenpflichtige Tiefgarage am Hotel.

name: H2 Berlin-Alexanderplatz
description: Das H4 Hotel Berlin Alexanderplatz verwöhnt mit gehobenen Komfort in 336 Zimmer und Suiten mit Klimaanlage, Kaffee & Teestation Safe, Flatscreen-TV mit SKY Sports, Radio und inklusivem WLAN. Der SPA Bereich mit Whirlwanne und Sauna sorgen für Entspannung. Das Hotelrestaurant inklusive Kaminzimmer und separater Raucherlounge sowie die Hotelbar „Destille“ laden in gemütlicher Atmosphäre zum Verweilen ein. Kostenpflichtige Parkplätze und 2 Elektro-Tankstellen stehen in der Tiefgarage zur Verfügung.
